articles.author: JOVANA GEC, DUSAN STOJANOVIC
articles.title: Xi begins Serbia visit on the 25th anniversary of NATO's bombing of the Chinese Embassy - The Associated Press
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping’s visit to European ally Serbia falls on a symbolic date: the 25th anniversary of the bombing of the Chinese Embassy during NATO’s air war over Kosovo. Xi arrived Tuesday from France. On May 7, 1999 U.S. jets dropped five bombs on th…
articles.content: BELGRADE, Serbia (AP) Chinese leader Xi Jinpings visit to European ally Serbia on Tuesday falls on a symbolic date: the 25th anniversary of the bombing of the Chinese Embassy in Belgrade during NATOs… [+4285 chars]
